title: Google\Cloud\Monitoring\V3\NotificationChannelDescriptor
name: NotificationChannelDescriptor
description:
A description of a notification channel. The descriptor includes the properties of the channel and the set of labels or fields that must be specified to configure channels of a given type.

Generated from protobuf message google.monitoring.v3.NotificationChannelDescriptor

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: The full REST resource name for this descriptor. The format is: projects/[PROJECT_ID_OR_NUMBER]/notificationChannelDescriptors/[TYPE] In the above, [TYPE] is the value of the type field.

params.name: data.type
params.description: The type of notification channel, such as "email" and "sms". To view the full list of channels, see Channel descriptors. Notification channel types are globally unique.

params.name: data.display_name
params.description: A human-readable name for the notification channel type. This form of the name is suitable for a user interface.

params.name: data.description
params.description: A human-readable description of the notification channel type. The description may include a description of the properties of the channel and pointers to external documentation.

params.name: data.labels
params.description: The set of labels that must be defined to identify a particular channel of the corresponding type. Each label includes a description for how that field should be populated.

params.name: data.supported_tiers
params.description: The tiers that support this notification channel; the project service tier must be one of the supported_tiers.

params.name: data.launch_stage
params.description: The product launch stage for channels of this type.
